name: Can't catch me!
description:
Where is this? How did you get here? Who cares when there's stuff to smash? Don't let the security bots stop you!

  • Move with arrow keys or WASD. 
  • When rage bar (red) is full you can use CTRL to go berserk. While berserk the character runs around randomly and breaks anything he can. 
  • To interact with objects stand near them until blue bar runs out
  • You need keys to open doors or you might smash through them while berserk.
  • If security guards touch you 5 seconds you are caught.

Solo project for GMTK Game Jam 2020.
